channel.title: Movie Morons Film Review
channel.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
channel.description: We want to fill your ipod or ipod facsimiles full to the brim with interviews, reviews and in-depth conversations about movies. We’ll talk about everything from the sub-genre of underwater movies to films of the Francois Truffaut. We don't regurgitate plot or muse on celebrity rumours. Movie Morons is an unpretentious podcast for cinephiles who like to be entertained AND dazzled by astonishing intellect. Hit that subscribe button and give us a shot.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Join the Movie Morons as they interview filmmakers, review films and discuss the all sorts of sophisticated film crap.
channel.itunes:summary: We want to fill your ipod or ipod facsimiles full to the brim with interviews, reviews and in-depth conversations about movies. We’ll talk about everything from the sub-genre of underwater movies to films of the Francois Truffaut. We don't regurgitate plot or muse on celebrity rumours. Movie Morons is an unpretentious podcast for cinephiles who like to be entertained AND dazzled by astonishing intellect. Hit that subscribe button and give us a shot.
channel.itunes:keywords: movie, cinema, film, television, discussion, review, actor, writer, director, talk, morons, entertainment

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP16
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: In MORONS REQUEST LIVE we answer a listener email about Spanish and foreign films. ALSO: THE MALTEASE FALCON discusses Jonathan Demme's Something Wild in MALTEASERS #3. Gordon THE ANIMAL Burkell of The Cutting Room Podcast co-hosts.
item.itunes:subtitle: In MORONS REQUEST LIVE we answer a listener email about Spanish and foreign films. ALSO: THE MALTEASE FALCON discusses Jonathan Demme's Something Wild in MALTEASERS #3. Gordon THE ANIMAL Burkell of The Cutting Room Podcast co-hosts.

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP15
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: A busy episode! Part 2 of the Colin Geddes interview - Morons Request Live featuring a discussion on the influence of Lethal Weapon/Die Hard on subsequent action films - A controversial voice message - Gordon Burkell's Cutting Room Podcast shout out!
item.itunes:subtitle: A busy episode! Part 2 of the Colin Geddes interview - Morons Request Live featuring a discussion on the influence of Lethal Weapon/Die Hard on subsequent action films - A controversial voice message - Gordon Burkell's Cutting Room Podcast shout out!
item.itunes:keywords: movie, cinema, film, television, discussion, review, actor, writer, director, talk, morons, entertainment

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP14
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: Encyclopedia Chris co-hosts with The Giant Squid. The Big Interview features a chat with Toronto Film dude Colin Geddes. Our new segment Morons Request Live features a discussion about Hitchock's lesser known film I Confess.
item.itunes:subtitle: Encyclopedia Chris co-hosts with The Giant Squid. The Big Interview features a chat with Toronto Film dude Colin Geddes. Our new segment Morons Request Live features a discussion about Hitchock's lesser known film I Confess.
item.itunes:keywords: movie, cinema, film, television, discussion, review, actor, writer, director, talk, morons, entertainment

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP13
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: The Professor tells us why we're idiotic if we don't like Francis Ford Coppola's The Conversation. Also, Maltese Falcon discusses a personal favourite - Dogfight - on his segment Malteasers. PLUS: Listener email!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Professor tells us why we're idiotic if we don't like Francis Ford Coppola's The Conversation. Also, Maltese Falcon discusses a personal favourite - Dogfight - on his segment Malteasers. PLUS: Listener email!
item.itunes:keywords: movie, cinema, film, television, discussion, review, actor, writer, director, talk, morons, entertainment

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP12
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: The Beloved Richard Crouse joins The Professor and James TheGiantSquid for part two of their in-depth chat about film criticism. PLUS: A brand new segment Malteasers features a discussion about Jonathan Glazer's 2004 film Birth.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Beloved Richard Crouse joins The Professor and James TheGiantSquid for part two of their in-depth chat about film criticism. PLUS: A brand new segment Malteasers features a discussion about Jonathan Glazer's 2004 film Birth.

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP11
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: The Beloved Richard Crouse joins The Professor and The GiantSquid for an in-depth chat about film criticism today. Also: Train Wreck Man Child is back with more new video releases.

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP10
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: In honour of another Oscar year over, The Professor tells the Maltese Falcon why Brian DePalma was screwed out of an Oscar for The Untouchables. Plus, Queen Video New Releases Staff Picks and a reference to actor Lee Horsley.
item.itunes:subtitle: In honour of another Oscar year over, The Professor tells the Maltese Falcon why Brian DePalma was screwed out of an Oscar for The Untouchables. Plus, Queen Video New Releases Staff Picks and a reference to actor Lee Horsley.

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP9
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: Tony Dalton talks to us about his friend Ray Harryhausen and their book The History of Stop Motion Animation. Train Wreck Man Child serves up gold with Queen Video New Releases. PLUS: The debut of Brock 'Stay At Home Dad' Hodgkinson.
item.itunes:subtitle: Tony Dalton talks to us about his friend Ray Harryhausen and their book The History of Stop Motion Animation. Train Wreck Man Child serves up gold with Queen Video New Releases. PLUS: The debut of Brock 'Stay At Home Dad' Hodgkinson.

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP8
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: Richard Crouse picks a nickname and features with The Professor; they offer up a 10 Best of '09 Smackdown. Train Wreck is back with Queen Video Staff Picks.

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP7
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: Joe Dante takes time to chat with the Morons about 3D, stupid studio notes and cold actors. Plus: Train Wreck is back with Queen Video Staff Picks.

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP6
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: The Morons apologize for the unexpected layoff. Unsinkable Erin Brown explains to Encyclopedia Chris why You're An Idiot If You Don't Like THE MAN WHO FELL TO EARTH. Plus: a mystery host fills in for the absent Train Wreck Man Child.

item.title: Morons Halloween 09 Mini-sode #1
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: This Movie Morons Halloween Mini-sode features Bern 'Pretty Fun Guy' Euler explained the merits of Australian Indie Sci-Fi Zombie flick Undead to an enthusiastic Train Wreck Man Child. PLUS: Animal Cruelty guidelines in regards to zombified fish.

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP5
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: Special guest 'The Unsinkable' Erin Brown explains to the Maltese Falcon why DON'T LOOK NOW is a truly great horror film. PLUS: Bern and James address a controversial email and Train Wreck Man Child talks about new releases in the world of DVD rentals.

item.title: Morons Classics #3
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: Morons Classics #3 offers up a chat about two British comedies, one new and one old in a segment called Popcorn Picks. PLUS: You're An Idiot If You Don't Like This Movie - The Professor challenges the Maltese Falcon on his love of Scorsese's After Hours.

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP4
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: A BLOCKBUSTER EPISODE! David Fincher's films are examined in-depth by the Professor in the new segment Professor On Director. Also, Train Wreck Man Child discusses some interesting upcoming video releases. PLUS: Bern Euler returns to the Morons Podcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: A BLOCKBUSTER EPISODE! David Fincher's films are examined in-depth by the Professor in the new segment Professor On Director. Also, Train Wreck Man Child discusses some interesting upcoming video releases. PLUS: Bern Euler returns to the Morons Podcast.

item.title: Morons Classics #2
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: Material from the original Morons podcasts. Classics #2 features Film Forum with Encyclopedia Chris discussing The Big Lebowski's roots in Film Noir. PLUS: The Professor thinks you're an idiot if you don't like Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind.

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP3
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: Canada's #1 Film Critic Richard Crouse features in the segment YOU'RE AN IDIOT IF YOU DON'T LIKE THIS MOVIE. He talks to The Professor about the Peter Sellers comedy, The Party. PLUS: find out what's hot with Queen Video New Releases and Staff Picks.

item.title: Morons Classics #1
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: Presents material from the original Movie Morons podcasts. Classics #1 features cinematographer Dean Cundey. He talks about his work with Spielberg, Zemeckis and Carpenter PLUS: Hangover Bob discusses SciFi horror classic The Thing.

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP2
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: Episode 2 features a new segment called, OSCAR, HOW COULD YOU?. IMDB Mike argues that the two leads of Election should have won Oscars for their work. Plus: Queen Video Staff Picks discusses big releasees including Polanski’s Repulsion. Don't miss it!

item.title: Movie Morons Film Review EP1
item.itunes:author: James Villeneuve
item.description: The Movie Morons podcast is back! The Professor discusses Vertigo in the popular segment 'YOU'RE AN IDIOT IF YOU DON'T LIKE THIS MOVIE'. Also: James and Train Wreck Man-Child tell you about home video new releases and staff picks for Queen Video.
